description: small two page sections with five or six horizontal square images; last section has fold-out horizontal and vertical larger images; hand-written red ink captions; sixty-five images; green cover; orange box
markings: on colophon page, in red ink: [J.M. Beard]
text: An acclaimed set designer, mural painter, photographer, and sculptor, Beard is also active as a book artist, having produced sixteen titles to date, including Neo-Classik Comix, an amusing autobiographical account of his life in New York City during a single month. He recounts various personal experiences-house guests, a gallery opening, an encounter with the IRS-in a series of figurative drawings accompanied by hand-written text, then manipulating the inking of each print using Q-Tips and cotton balls.
title: Neo-Classik Comix: Adventures on 27th Street
